<a id="StyleBoxEmpty"></a>

# StyleBoxEmpty

**Inherits:** [StyleBox](StyleBox.md) **\<** [Resource](Resource.md) **\<** [RefCounted](RefCounted.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

An empty [StyleBox](StyleBox.md) (does not display anything).

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

An empty [StyleBox](StyleBox.md) that can be used to display nothing instead of the default style (e.g. it can "disable" ``focus`` styles).
